form.official-title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to provide that residential mortgage loans held in portfolio qualify as qualified mortgages for purposes of the presumption of the ability to repay requirements under such Act, and for other purposes.

section.header: Loans held on portfolio treated as qualified mortgages
section.text: Section 129C(b)(2) of the Truth in Lending Act (15 U.S.C. 1639c(b)(2)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: The term qualified mortgage includes a residential mortgage loan made by a creditor having less than $10,000,000,000 in total assets so long as such loan appears on the balance sheet of such creditor.
